        Description copied from interface: IPartition
        Returns whether this partition contains directed graphs or not.
        Specified by:
        isDirected in interface IPartition
        Returns:
        true if this partition contains directed graphs, and false if this partition contains undirected graphs

      • containsVertex

        public boolean containsVertex(long vertexId)
        Description copied from interface: IPartition
        Returns whether or not this partition has a subgraph that knows of the specified vertex. The subgraph does not necessarily own the vertex, it may only know of it as a remote vertex which is owned by some other subgraph, but it will still return true if the vertex exists as a remote vertex in this partition. See #ownsVertex(long) to find out if a vertex is owned by this partition.
        Specified by:
        containsVertex in interface IPartition
        Parameters:
        vertexId - the vertex to check subgraphs for
        Returns:
        true if this partition has a subgraph that contains the specified vertex

      • getSubgraphForVertex

        public long getSubgraphForVertex(long vertexId)
        Description copied from interface: IPartition
        Returns the subgraph that contains the given vertex id. Return value is only specified if IPartition.containsVertex(long) returns true for this vertex. In most implementations this will likely be a scan linear in time by the number of subgraphs.
        Specified by:
        getSubgraphForVertex in interface IPartition
        Parameters:
        vertexId - the vertex to check subgraphs for
        Returns:
        the subgraph that contains this vertex

        Parameters:

        Returns:
